arts.ttl: The stat about Messi that has Argentina worried
arts.sum: Messi failed to find the net in matches against Brazil, Venezuela, and now Paraguay, and he missed Argentina’s away games against Colombia and Bolivia. Out of the four away matches Messi has played with Argentina in this campaign, he has failed to score in three.

arts.ttl: Lisandro Martinez injury update issued by Argentina boss as Man Utd star left in pain
arts.sum: Manchester United centre-back Lisandro Martinez travelled to South America for Argentina's World Cup qualifiers, only to be ruled out of action by a back injury

arts.ttl: Furious Lionel Messi confronts 'coward' referee after Argentina suffer shock defeat
arts.sum: Lionel Messi was left frustrated as Argentina fell to a shock defeat at the hands of Paraguay on Thursday night, with the Inter Miami star confronting the referee during the game

arts.ttl: Sanabria scores perfect bicycle kick goal against Lautaro’s Argentina – Video
arts.sum: Antonio Sanabria of Torino found a spectacular way to inspire Paraguay’s 2-1 win over Argentina...

arts.ttl: Lisandro Martinez injury update issued by Argentina boss - after Man United star was forced to withdraw from international duty
arts.sum: Martinez was released by Argentina shortly after his arrival for their World Cup qualifiers against Paraguay and Peru, with initial reports stating he was suffering from a hip problem.

arts.ttl: Messi held in check as Paraguay shock Argentina
arts.sum: A stunning bicycle kick from Antonio Sanabria and a second-half header from Omar Alderete gave Paraguay a well earned 2-1 home win over Argentina in the South American World Cup qualifiers on Thursday.

arts.ttl: Messi jerseys to test Paraguay's away shirt ban
arts.sum: Argentina coach Lionel Scaloni is confident there will be Lionel Messi jerseys in the home section despite the Paraguayan Football Association's ban on rival shirts.

arts.ttl: Man United injury news: Extent of "significant" Lisandro Martinez injury revealed
arts.sum: Manchester United defender Lisandro Martinez could face a spell on the sidelines with the hip injury he sustained in the 3-0 win over Leicester City.

arts.ttl: When is Paraguay vs Argentina? Times, how to watch on TV and stream online
arts.sum: Having enjoyed a thumping win in their most recent qualifier, holders Argentina can take another big step towards the 2026 World Cup when they visit Paraguay. Argentina lead the way in South America’s World Cup qualifying competition, sitting top of the 10-team table with 22 points, three ahead of second-placed Colombia.

arts.ttl: When is Bolivia vs Paraguay? Times, how to watch on TV and stream online
arts.sum: Bolivia host Paraguay on matchday 12 of South America’s men’s World Cup qualifying competition, in a clash between two nations that are out to end long waits to return to FIFA’s flagship international tournament. Having failed to qualify for the World Cup since 1994, Bolivia went into November international week sitting seventh in CONMEBOL’s 10-team qualifying group - one point behind sixth-placed Paraguay, who last made the finals in 2010.
